Mutate MS2 into mass_dataset

Xiaotao Shen (https://www.shenxt.info/)

true

Created on 2021-12-04 and updated on 2021-12-15

Source: vignettes/mutate_ms2.Rmd
mutate_ms2.Rmd

Data preparation 

library(massdataset)
library(tidyverse)

data("expression_data")
data("sample_info")
data("sample_info_note")
data("variable_info")
data("variable_info_note")

object =
  create_mass_dataset(
    expression_data = expression_data,
    sample_info = sample_info,
    variable_info = variable_info,
    sample_info_note = sample_info_note,
    variable_info_note = variable_info_note
  )
  
object
#> -------------------- 
#> massdataset version: 0.01 
#> -------------------- 
#> 1.expression_data:[ 1000 x 8  data.frame]
#> 2.sample_info:[ 8 x 4 data.frame]
#> 3.variable_info:[ 1000 x 3 data.frame]
#> 4.sample_info_note:[ 4 x 2 data.frame]
#> 5.variable_info_note:[ 3 x 2 data.frame]
#> 6.ms2_data:[ 0 variables x 0 MS2 spectra]
#> -------------------- 
#> Processing information (extract_process_info())
#> Creation ---------- 
#>       Package         Function.used                Time
#> 1 massdataset create_mass_dataset() 2021-12-15 21:40:55

###MS2 data (mgf data)
dir.create("demo_data")
file.copy(
  system.file("ms2_data", package = "massdataset"),
  to = "demo_data",
  overwrite = TRUE, 
  recursive = TRUE
)
#> [1] TRUE

Mutate MS2 

object2 = 
mutate_ms2(
  object = object,
  column = "rp",
  polarity = "positive",
  ms1.ms2.match.mz.tol = 10, 
  ms1.ms2.match.rt.tol = 15, 
  path = "example"
)
#> Reading mgf data...
#> 135 out of 1000 variable have MS2 spectra.
#> Selecting the most intense MS2 spectrum for each peak...

extract_ms2_data(object2)
#> $QC_MS2_NCE25_1.mgf
#> -------------------- 
#> column: rp 
#> polarity: positive 
#> mz_tol: 10 
#> rt_tol (second): 15 
#> -------------------- 
#> 135 variables:
#> M93T311_POS M87T884_POS M117T151_POS M215T860_POS M147T659_POS...
#> 134 MS2 spectra.
#> mz93.054297273787rt321.834246 mz87.043769836426rt884.75604 mz117.09058380127rt141.946374 mz214.98680312326rt865.76268 mz147.049713134766rt657.13878...
